item.title: Our Founding and Vision
item.description:
Steinitz Chess Club — A Short History

Mission. Steinitz Chess Club exists to create a welcoming, competitive, and educational space for chess players of all ages and abilities in Cape Town. We believe chess strengthens critical thinking, sportsmanship, and community — and we run events, training and outreach programs to bring those benefits to as many people as possible.
